channel.title: Graham Pople's site
channel.description: Recent content on Graham Pople's site

item.title: C-to-Scala Transpiler
item.description: Converts C code into Scala. CParser on github is my library that turns C into a clean abstract syntax tree (AST), and can be embedded in any JVM-language project. The code is written in Scala and transpiled to Javascript so it can be embedded directly here:

item.title: This Personal Site
item.description: Coded with the Hugo static site generator.

item.title: Undiscovered Guide
item.description: Undiscovered Guide is a travel website I created with my partner while we were travelling, to help others explore our favourite parts of the world. It’s pretty popular, getting over 30,000 monthly page views. There’s a lot going on under the hood: Parts of it are a dynamically-created single page app. It’s written in Scala, transpiled to Javascript with ScalaJS. The backend CMS is custom and written from scratch in Scala.
